title: Tuskegee Institute National Historic Site: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit          Planning your visit to the Tuskegee Institute National Historic Site. There are many and varied things to see and do.  Come, follow Booker T. Washington as he travels from the slave house to the White house.... Join George Washington Carver as he unlocks the secret lives of the peanut, sweet potato and soy bean... Endure the struggles of Dr. Robert Moton to provide health care for America's black veterans... Envision Dr. F.W. Patterson as he sees the future of black education in development of the United Negro College Fund... Feel the exhilaration of Tuskegee students as they soar to new heights in achievements...  In addition to what's above, while making your plans consider some basic information to know before you come.
